code: @Override void performDuringNoSnapshot(IndexMetaData indexMetaData, ClusterState currentClusterState, Listener listener) {     String followerIndex = indexMetaData.getIndex().getName().     Map<String, String> customIndexMetadata = indexMetaData.getCustomData(CCR_METADATA_KEY).     if (customIndexMetadata == null) {         listener.onResponse(true).         return.     }     CloseIndexRequest closeIndexRequest = new CloseIndexRequest(followerIndex).     getClient().admin().indices().close(closeIndexRequest, ActionListener.wrap(r -> {         assert r.isAcknowledged() : "close index response is not acknowledged".         listener.onResponse(true).     }, listener::onFailure)). }
